title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions
Cook pancetta in a large skillet until crispy
Beat eggs with parmesan cheese and black pepper
Drain pasta and immediately toss with pancetta
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture
Serve immediately with extra parmesan

title: Simple Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Heat oil in a large wok or skillet
Cook chicken until golden brown
Add vegetables and stir fry for 3-4 minutes
Add soy sauce, garlic, and ginger
Serve over cooked rice

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package directions
Chop tomatoes and cucumber into bite-sized pieces
Mix quinoa with vegetables and olives
Crumble feta cheese on top
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper

title: Beef Tacos with Guacamole
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet
Season with taco seasoning
Mash avocado with lime juice and salt
Warm taco shells
Fill shells with beef, cheese, and lettuce
Top with guacamole and cilantro

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375Â°F
Mix butter and sugars until creamy
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Combine flour and baking soda
Gradually add flour mixture to butter mixture
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased cookie sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown
